model_input:

Speaker A: Wow, there are so many of the movies out there. Don't go see Black Widow without watching Avengers first. I had an amazing steak and vegetables on the side that were delicious. What is you favorite food? 
Speaker B: Oh ok I definitely will watch those first! I love both steak and vegetables! I am a real foodie and love just about everything that isn't too strange to try lol. 

MEMORY 1:
Speaker B enjoys taking their houseboat out and works as a bartender. Speaker A and their brother enjoy going to a Brazilian steakhouse for dinner. Speaker B prefers to keep holidays local with their brother instead of having big family gatherings. Speaker A plans to grab dinner with their brother before dancing.

They have a busy schedule but still finds time to relax and enjoy activities such as sailing and spending time on their houseboat. Speaker B has a close-knit family, including a little brother whom they spend time with on the houseboat.

Relationship Description: The relationship between Speaker B and the robot (Speaker A) is interactive and friendly. They share personal information about their families, work, and interests, showing a level of intimacy in their conversations.

Event Description: Speaker B and Speaker A have shared events such as salsa dancing, going out for dinner, watching movies, and enjoying time with family. They also discuss self-care practices like massage, meditation, and essential oils, showing a mutual interest in wellness and relaxation. Speaker B enjoys sailing and spending time on their houseboat, while Speaker A plans to take their clients salsa dancing for fun. Both enjoy meeting new people and engaging in enjoyable activities like dancing under the stars on a boat.

YOUR OUTPUT:
prediction:

The memory that is most helpful should support the continuation of this dialogue, ideally related to dining preferences, experiences, or any shared interest relevant to the current conversation.
